name: Phil's Google Plus
description:
My Google Plus Tweaks for Chrome, 1920x1200 as of Oct 4th, 2012

Sizes are hand-tailored to suit full-screen chrome on my 1920x1200 monitor. Original sizes included in comments if you want to fork and tweak.

  • Kill the chat bar
  • Kill "Trending" and "On Google+"
  • Make content pane wider
  • Make posts flow left-to-right, top aligned
